title: EVE PEARL Your Beautiful Face Essential 6-piece Collection — QVC.com
text:
3 reviews A Note from Eve Pearl 
"I believe we all deserve to look our best. Everything I create is with purpose. My products and tools are all designed to work together for faster, more effective results. Simplifying our lives–that's what EVE PEARL is all about. I get it, we all live busy lives–but haven't we earned the right to look our best, even when we don't have the time? To make this possible, I've created luxe, easy-to-use products that apply in moments and may provide long-term skin-care benefits. Enjoy!" –Eve Pearl Application Instructions Feel flawless with this EVE PEARL essential six-piece collection. The HD Dual Foundation is a full-coverage, color-correction cream foundation that's versatile and easy to apply. Cover the look of redness and imperfections with this lightweight, non-greasy cream foundation that also helps to hydrate skin. Plus, there's no need for powder to set.The Blush Trio is a cheek color combination ideally matched for your skin tone, undertone, and anything you decide to wear. The compact includes a matte peach, a matte pink, and a bronzer for contouring and highlighting effects. Its silky-textured formula with vitamin E blends on your skin for beautiful wear.The Brow Liner & Definer features three shapes for thin, medium, and thick strokes. The spoolie hairs blend the rich formula, creating natural-looking effects.The Creme Lipstick is infused with vitamin E and peptides, delivering smooth, vivid color that stays on your lips.Boasting Soft Touch handles, the dual-sided brushes provide efficient application with thousands of dark, 3D MicroSilk fibers. Plus, a reusable pouch stores and protects them.How do I use it: Use one side of the Contour Brush to apply the lighter shade of HD Dual Foundation below the cheeks and eyelids. Flip the brush to apply the darker shade to cheek, forehead, nose, chin, and anywhere that needs extra coverage. Use the Blender Brush to achieve a flawless-looking complexion with definition. For a more sheer finish, spray water to the Blender Brush and blend.Dab the Fan Brush into all three shades of the Blush Trio. Smile and sweep across your cheeks. Use the Highlighter Brush to apply over eyelids and smooth under your eyes.Twist the Brow Liner & Definer to reveal the tip. Apply at an angle and blend upwards with the Spoolie to create natural-looking eyebrows.Smile and apply the Creme Lipstick to your lips.From EVE PEARL. 
Includes 0.51-oz HD Dual Foundation in Fair, Light, Medium, Tan, Dark, or Deep; 0.32-oz Blush Trio in Sweet Cheeks or Sultry Cheeks; 0.01-oz Brow Liner & Definer in Cocoa or Espresso; 0.12-oz Creme Lipstick in Rose; #201 Dual Contour Blender Brush; #204 Dual Fan Highlighter Brush; and reusable brush pouch Fair: a super-porcelain shade for ultra-fair skin Light: a neutral light shade with ivory, cream tones Medium: a universal shade for neutral, cool, and warm tones; good choice if you are unsure of your shade Tan: a golden warm shade; suitable if you self-tan Dark: a dark chocolate shade Deep: a rich espresso shade
